data.oai_dc:dc: All data collected from the first fluctuating temperature experiment with Arabidopsis thaliana which included 36 flowering mutants and NILs in the Columbia and Landsberg genetic backgrounds. See README file for details.
flowering time|FLOWERING LOCUS C (FLC)|FRIGIDA|fluctuating temperature|phenotypic plasticity|day length|vernalization|autonomous pathway mutants|life history|shade avoidance
